effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep. If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep. If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep. If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.
